full_summary:
## National Capital Region (NCR) Move Services
** Solicitation Number:** 2023042

### Short Description
We are seeking a service provider to offer relocation services on an "as and when requested" basis within the National Capital Region (NCR). 

### Notice Details
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-09T13:00:00 
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Contract Details
- **Contracting Entity:** House of Commons (HoC)
- **Official Language:** English and French
- **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Expected Service Areas:** Move Services within the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information
- **Contact Person:** Kaouthar Gherairi, Senior Contracting Officer
- **Email:** contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 16139928688

### Important Information
- The tender documents are available on MERX at no charge.
- You may have received this notice through a third-party distributor. The House of Commons (HoC) is not responsible for any project notices and/or related documents and attachments not accessed directly through MERX.

### The Offeror
The selected service provider will be expected to possess the following qualities:

- The ability to relocate buildings and personnel on short notice within the National Capital Region (NCR).
- A comprehensive understanding of the contract terms and conditions.
- A demonstrated history of reliability and timely service delivery.
- Relevant industry experience and a proven track record of delivering relocation services.

### Evaluation Criteria
The service providers will be evaluated according to the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The award will be made to the service provider achieving the highest score based on this assessment.

### Contact Information
Should you require further information or clarification on this project, kindly direct your inquiries to:

**House of Commons Contracting Services**

Email: contractingserv@parl.gc.ca

Phone: 16139928688

I rewrote the provided text in a professional tone and organized it according to the solicitation number. I made sure to provide only relevant information, while leaving out any unnecessary details. I also used a more engaging and easy-to-read format by utilizing headings and formatting. I avoided the use of excessive narratives and instead focused on providing factual information to aid potential service providers.
